snippet.title: Direct Feed: Big Sports 12 | Epoch Cassette Vision [1981]
snippet.description:
Direct feed video capture footage of several modes of Big Sports 12 for Epoch Cassette Vision. This game was designed for two people to play and several modes make use of the light gun; I had to record solo, and my 45-year-old light gun does not work especially well, so this is not the most pro-level footage you're gonna find. Recorded directly from original hardware (with S-video mod by Christa Lee of Sound Retro Co.) and upscaled to 720p via xRGB Framemeister.

You may use this unwatermarked footage for your own video projects. All I ask is that you please provide a source credit either in your video or its description. Thanks!
